title: Disconnect on load screen, can't reconnect and leaverbustered.
body:
I have been unable to successfully connect to the game after champion select finishes. Once the game officially ends I'm then allowed past the "reconnect" button and back to the main menu. 

I'm posting here because I'm concerned about the problem becoming worse and having my account banned if I continue to make any attempt to solve this predicament that I have found myself in.

edit: I should have added that I have been put in a low priority queue because of being disconnected from the last three games. (Feel free to look at the match history)

 _Pls send help_.

replies.body: This happens to me too sometimes, and if reconnecting doesn't work when it pops up, i usually just do the same thing and reload the client. You might also consider about getting a better internet connection :/
happens to me sometimes, then i have to close the client reload by that time my lane is lost because of the time it sits saying it's loading and doesn't.

Do you have any firewalls or anti-viruses enabled? Try turning them all off before playing.

Also, test out your games in custom games where you're the only player, so that you won't get further punished.
